nodes.text: Artificial intelligence was a form of technology that could be installed into droids to give them some degree of independent thought. Doctor Gubacher of the Galactic Republic was an artificial intelligence specialist, designing and making modifications to droids for the Republic during the Clone Wars. Kallon, a member of the Free Ryloth Movement, was considered to be a genius with artificial intelligence, and had used his knowledge to reprogram the brains of Separatist droid fighters.

Eternal Rur was the name held by the disembodied consciousness of a deceased male human Rur which was stored within the Rur crystal. It was located at the Citadel of Rur and was destroyed around 0 ABY.
In the time following the Battle of Endor, Imperial Grand Admiral Rae Sloane tried listening to a phono-play about a droid containing an artificial intelligence named ADAM.
The auto-fighters were automated TIE line starfighters that were produced by the  forces under Commodore Visler Korda on the planet Rekkana.
